articles.title: Beyond the Pale festival cancelled just days before kickoff at Glendalough Estate
articles.description: Festival infrastructure was already in place as suppliers began dismantling site after organisers announced sudden cancellation
articles.content:
One of Ireland’s most popular music festivals, Beyond the Pale, has been cancelled just days before it was due to begin next weekend.
